alert.note: Alert for McLean; Mercer; Mountrail; Ward (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 9:46PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF WARD, NORTHWESTERN MCLEAN, SOUTHEASTERN MOUNTRAIL AND NORTHERN MERCER COUNTIES THROUGH 1015 PM CDT... At 944 PM CDT, strong thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles west of Minot Air Force Base to near Des Lacs to 5 miles southwest of Roseglen. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Des Lacs around 950 PM CDT. Minot Air Force Base around 955 PM CDT. Burlington and Rice Lake around 1000 PM CDT. Douglas and Minot around 1005 PM CDT. Garrison and Fort Stevenson State Park around 1015 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Logan, White Shield, Wolseth, Hartland, Deep Water Creek Recreation Area, Raub and Emmet. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. If on or near Lake Sakakawea or Rice Lake, get out of the water and move indoors or inside a vehicle. Remember, lightning can strike out to 10 miles from the parent thunderstorm. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Move to safe shelter now! Do not be caught on the water in a thunderstorm.
